item.description:
Next Tuesday (the 11th), we're going to be starting a new DnD 3.5 campaign, to last at least till the beginning of the Fall semester. All you need to bring is a DnD character of 6th level, which can include rules from the following books:

All 3.5 Core Rulebooks
Players Handbook 2
Dungeon Masters Guide 2
Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting
Magic of Faerun
Silver Marches
Spell Compendium
Eberron Campaign Setting
Sharn: The City of Towers
Complete Warrior
Complete Divine
Complete Arcane
Complete Adventurer
Unearthed Arcana (check with me to see what variants are used)

If you want to play a unique or rare race, make sure to contact me beforehand. Otherwise, only things from the above books can be used. NO EXCEPTIONS!

Im not going to spoil the campaign itself, but keep in mind its a somewhat traditional published adventure series, so you may have played it before. First, I am changing the events somewhat. Second, as all my games are, it may change during play. Lastly, even if youve played it before, dont spoil it for the others.

Since its the summer session, the normal $1 fee for non-students is waived.

Parking is normally found in the student lot, to the left of the main building. There is a guest parking area, but it's limited to 30 minutes only.

The event is on the first floor, in room 1128. A map of the campus can be found at http://www.ccri.edu/f...
item.name: CCRI Roleplayer's Guild DnD Game- First Campaign Adventure!
